Matthias Schwarzbacher (born 22 December 2005) is a Slovak cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Continental team .
Major results
;2023
: 1st  Overall Medzinárodné dni cyklistiky Dubnica nad Váhom

::1st Stage 2
